name: Iceburg
text:
This Leader cannot attack.
Activate: Main DON!!! -1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck), you may rest this Leader: Play up to 1 Character with the (Galley-La Company) type with a cost of 5 or less from your hand.

effect.text: You may rest this Leader: Play up to 1 Character with the (Galley-La Company) type with a cost of 5 or less from your hand.

meta.notes: The card is a sample image, so the text and layout may not reflect the final printed version.
